In this event wish, the 5-star character "Driving Thunder" [[Keqing]] ({{Electro}}) will get a huge drop-rate boost!

In this event wish, the 4-star characters "Eclipsing Star" [[Ningguang]] ({{Geo}}), "Trial by Fire" [[Bennett]] ({{Pyro}}), and "Shining Idol" [[Barbara]] ({{Hydro}}) will get a huge drop-rate boost!

For information about rates, see [[Wishes]].
